abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.75.1 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

sect1.title: Release Notes: 1.75.2
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.75.1 release.

sect2.title: Gentext
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the gentext code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Add Icelandic
Improved Japanese translation for Note(s). Closes bug #2823965.
Polish alphabet contains O with acute accent, not with grave accent. Closes bug #2823964.
Fix translation of "index", per bug report 2796064.
New Icelandic locale file.

sect2.title: Common
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Add Icelandic
Support more downconvert cases
Make sure title inside info is used if no other title.

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Turn off dbfo-need for fop1.extensions also, per bug #2816141.

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Output "Copyright" heading in XHTML too.
Added stylesheet.result.type test for copyright. Closes bug #2813289.
Remove ambiguity wrt @span, @rowspan, and @colspan

sect2.title: Manpages
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the manpages code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Added normalize-space() for ulink content. Closes bug #2793877.
Added stylesheet.result.type test for copyright. Closes bug #2813289.

sect2.title: Epub
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the epub code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Corrected bugs caused by path and file assumptions were not met
Cleaning up hardcoded values into parameters and fixing Ruby library to pass them properly; all thanks to patch from Liza Daly

sect2.title: Params
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the params code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Fixed typo.

sect2.title: Profiling
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the profiling code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Fix bug 2815493 missing exsl.node.set.available parameter.

sect2.title: XSL-Saxon
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the xsl-saxon code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Added fixes so that colgroups in the XHTML namespace are processed properly.

sect2.title: XSL-Xalan
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the xsl-xalan code since the 1.75.1 release.

screen.phrase: Added missing NetBeans configuration.
